name: Magic Maze (Alejandro Ortiz, Nikolaskapa, BlueGabi, ramonruiz99)
name_original: Magic Maze (Alejandro Ortiz, Nikolaskapa, BlueGabi, ramonruiz99)
description:
Magic Maze (Alejandro Ortiz, Nikolaskapa, BlueGabi, ramonruiz99) is an adventure game developed by Alejandro Ortiz, Nikolaskapa and BlueGabi. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play Magic Maze (Alejandro Ortiz, Nikolaskapa, BlueGabi, ramonruiz99) on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
